data.message: Hello! A friend of mine tried to change her password on 06.11.2017 and a security code was supposed to be sent to her mobile but she did not receive her SMS. Now she cannot access her profile - https://www.facebook.com/malkata.iva . Could you please contact her through the e-mail she registered with (malkata.iva@gmail.com) to fix the issue?

replies.message: Hi Demetra. We can help your friend recover her account. Learn how: http://bit.ly/2yIdNph. -Kiara
Facebook Hi Kiara, thanks for replying! She cannot log in to Facebook in order to follow the described steps.

Thanks for following up, Demetra. She may need to create a new account temporarily in order to recover her old one. Once she has recovered her old account, she can remove the duplicate by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2m4tKA5. -Kiara

Facebook She managed to log in through Safari but cannot log in through the mobile app as it requires a security code and she is not receiving it. Thank you for your support and assistance! Ива Иванова
She logged in! Thank you for your support and assistance! 😊
Facebook please read my pm to you
